00022 using System;
00023 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00024 
00025 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00026 {
00034     public sealed class StudentsTDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00035     {
00036         int _degreesOfFreedom;
00037 
00038         double _factor;
00039         double _exponent;
00040         double _summand;
00041 
00042         StandardDistribution _standardDistribution;
00043         ChiSquareDistribution _chiSquareDistribution;
00044 
00045         #region Construction
00046 
00051         public
00052         StudentsTDistribution()
00053             : base()
00054         {
00055             _standardDistribution = new StandardDistribution(RandomSource);
00056             _chiSquareDistribution = new ChiSquareDistribution(RandomSource);
00057             SetDistributionParameters(1);
00058         }
00059 
00068         public
00069         StudentsTDistribution(
00070             RandomSource random
00071             )
00072             : base(random)
00073         {
00074             _standardDistribution = new StandardDistribution(RandomSource);
00075             _chiSquareDistribution = new ChiSquareDistribution(RandomSource);
00076             SetDistributionParameters(1);
00077         }
00078 
00084         public
00085         StudentsTDistribution(
00086             int degreesOfFreedom
00087             )
00088             : base()
00089         {
00090             _standardDistribution = new StandardDistribution(RandomSource);
00091             _chiSquareDistribution = new ChiSquareDistribution(RandomSource);
00092             SetDistributionParameters(degreesOfFreedom);
00093         }
00094 
00095         #endregion
00096 
00101         public override RandomSource RandomSource
00102         {
00103             get
00104             {
00105                 return base.RandomSource;
00106             }
00107 
00108             set
00109             {
00110                 base.RandomSource = value;
00111                 _standardDistribution.RandomSource = value;
00112                 _chiSquareDistribution.RandomSource = value;
00113             }
00114         }
00115 
00116         #region Distribution Parameters
00117 
00121         public int DegreesOfFreedom
00122         {
00123             get { return _degreesOfFreedom; }
00124             set { SetDistributionParameters(value); }
00125         }
00126 
00131         public
00132         void
00133         SetDistributionParameters(
00134             int degreesOfFreedom
00135             )
00136         {
00137             if(!IsValidParameterSet(degreesOfFreedom))
00138             {
00139                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid, "degreesOfFreedom");
00140             }
00141 
00142             _degreesOfFreedom = degreesOfFreedom;
00143             _chiSquareDistribution.SetDistributionParameters(degreesOfFreedom);
00144 
00145             double a = 0.5 * (_degreesOfFreedom + 1);
00146             double nLn = Fn.GammaLn(a);
00147             double dLn1 = Math.Log(Math.Sqrt(Math.PI * _degreesOfFreedom));
00148             double dLn2 = Fn.GammaLn(0.5 * _degreesOfFreedom);
00149 
00150             _exponent = -a;
00151             _factor = Math.Exp(nLn - dLn1 - dLn2);
00152             _summand = Fn.BetaRegularized(0.5 * _degreesOfFreedom, 0.5, 1);
00153         }
00154 
00162         public static
00163         bool
00164         IsValidParameterSet(
00165             int degreesOfFreedom
00166             )
00167         {
00168             return degreesOfFreedom > 0;
00169         }
00170 
00171         #endregion
00172 
00173         #region Distribution Properties
00174 
00178         public override double Minimum
00179         {
00180             get { return double.MinValue; }
00181         }
00182 
00186         public override double Maximum
00187         {
00188             get { return double.MaxValue; }
00189         }
00190 
00197         public override double Mean
00198         {
00199             get
00200             {
00201                 if(_degreesOfFreedom < 2)
00202                 {
00203                     throw new NotSupportedException();
00204                 }
00205 
00206                 return 0.0;
00207             }
00208         }
00209 
00213         public override double Median
00214         {
00215             get
00216             {
00217                 return 0.0;
00218             }
00219         }
00220 
00227         public override double Variance
00228         {
00229             get
00230             {
00231                 if(_degreesOfFreedom < 3)
00232                 {
00233                     throw new NotSupportedException();
00234                 }
00235 
00236                 return _degreesOfFreedom / (_degreesOfFreedom - 2.0);
00237             }
00238         }
00239 
00246         public override double Skewness
00247         {
00248             get
00249             {
00250                 if(_degreesOfFreedom < 4)
00251                 {
00252                     throw new NotSupportedException();
00253                 }
00254 
00255                 return 0.0;
00256             }
00257         }
00258 
00262         public override
00263         double
00264         ProbabilityDensity(
00265             double x
00266             )
00267         {
00268             return _factor * Math.Pow(1.0 + x * x / _degreesOfFreedom, _exponent);
00269         }
00270 
00274         public override
00275         double
00276         CumulativeDistribution(
00277             double x
00278             )
00279         {
00280             double beta = Fn.BetaRegularized(
00281                 0.5 * _degreesOfFreedom,
00282                 0.5,
00283                 _degreesOfFreedom / (_degreesOfFreedom + x * x)
00284                 );
00285 
00286             return 0.5 + 0.5 * Math.Sign(x) * (_summand - beta);
00287         }
00288 
00289         #endregion
00290 
00291         #region Generator
00292 
00297         public override
00298         double
00299         NextDouble()
00300         {
00301             double z = _standardDistribution.NextDouble();
00302             double v = _chiSquareDistribution.NextDouble();
00303 
00304             return z / Math.Sqrt(v / _degreesOfFreedom);
00305         }
00306 
00307         #endregion
00308     }
00309 }
